title: Ceric
description: CERICShe's feisty, a real fire cracker but as sexy as hell. She's constantly getting herself and the others into trouble, but she's MINE. She thinks that she can just walk into danger and i will let her, but now she has the MC and me to keep her safe.NOVAHe's bossy, arrogant and possessive, but so damn hot. He thinks he can tell me what to do. He will have to earn my obedience, and prove to me that he's mine!CERIC is a steamy possessive, alpha male romance with guaranteed HEA, no cheating, and no cliffhanger! This book is the fourth book in the Elemental's MC series.
author: Alexi Ferreira
